name: True Blue
description: One of Madonna’s defining 80s pop albums, full of sparkling production and infectious melodies. It captures her artistic confidence and remains a cornerstone of her early career.

name: Norman Fucking Rockwell!
description: A lush and poetic record blending dreamy California nostalgia with cinematic melancholy. Often called Lana’s masterpiece, it highlights her strongest songwriting to date.

name: Hejira
description: A reflective journey through travel and self-discovery, carried by Mitchell’s intricate songwriting. Hejira is considered one of her most musically sophisticated albums.

name: Abbey Road
description: A legendary album featuring some of the Beatles’ most iconic songs and their famous crosswalk cover. Abbey Road blends polished production with the band’s timeless creativity.

name: Tapestry
description: A warm and intimate singer-songwriter classic filled with heartfelt lyrics and timeless melodies. Tapestry remains one of the most beloved albums of the 1970s.

name: The Dreaming
description: An experimental and theatrical record showing Kate Bush at her most daring. The Dreaming blends avant-garde production with imaginative storytelling.

name: Man's Best Friend (Alternate Cover)
description: A vibrant pop record full of catchy hooks and playful energy. This alternate cover edition brings a fresh visual take on Sabrina’s confident sound.

name: Man's Best Friend
description: A bright and engaging pop release showcasing Sabrina’s charm and sharp songwriting. Filled with upbeat tracks that highlight her playful personality.

name: Romance
description: A bold and atmospheric album exploring new sonic territory for the band. Romance blends post-punk spirit with sweeping, emotional arrangements.

name: Skinty Fia
description: A dark and richly textured album influenced by themes of identity and displacement. Skinty Fia marks one of the band’s most ambitious artistic steps.

name: Raw Data Feel
description: An energetic mix of electronic textures and art-pop experimentation. Raw Data Feel pushes the band’s boundary-breaking creativity forward.

name: Arc
description: A sharp and emotional art-rock record packed with inventive melodies. Arc balances complex ideas with instantly memorable hooks.

name: Gossamer
description: A bright, shimmering indie-pop album full of vibrant synths and emotional depth. Gossamer remains one of Passion Pit’s most beloved releases.

name: Hit Parade
description: A stylish mix of avant-pop and electronic groove, overflowing with Murphy’s unique charisma. Hit Parade is daring, colorful, and endlessly replayable.

name: The Doors
description: A psychedelic rock landmark introducing the world to Jim Morrison’s haunting voice. The album blends blues, poetry, and hypnotic instrumentation.

name: Bridge Over Troubled Water
description: An emotional and beautifully arranged folk-rock masterpiece. The harmonies and orchestral touches make it one of the duo’s most enduring works.

name: Parsley, Sage, Rosemary and Thyme
description: A poetic and reflective record filled with delicate melodies. The duo’s vocal blend brings a timeless warmth to every track.

name: Wednesday Morning, 3 A.M.
description: A gentle folk debut marked by acoustic arrangements and storytelling charm. It captures the early chemistry of the iconic duo.

name: Slave to the Rhythm
description: A bold conceptual album built around hypnotic rhythms and dramatic vocal performances. Grace Jones delivers one of her most iconic artistic statements.

name: Living My Life
description: A stylish blend of reggae, new wave, and art-pop sensibilities. Living My Life showcases Jones’ commanding voice and sharp musical identity.

name: Nightclubbing
description: An influential fusion of dub, funk, and cool electronic textures. Nightclubbing is widely considered Grace Jones’ defining album.

name: Homework
description: A raw, energetic debut that helped shape modern electronic music. Homework blends house, techno, and punk attitude into a groundbreaking sound.

name: Fetch the Bolt Cutters
description: A bold, percussive, and fiercely personal album recorded largely at home. Its raw energy and inventive production earned universal acclaim.

name: Voyage
description: ABBA’s long-awaited return combines lush pop harmonies with modern production. Voyage feels nostalgic yet fresh, celebrating the group’s signature melodic sound.

name: Born to Die
description: A cinematic blend of vintage glamour and dark pop melancholy. Born to Die introduced Lana’s iconic aesthetic, pairing sweeping strings with introspective lyrics.

name: Brat
description: A sharp, club-ready pop album packed with attitude and forward-thinking production. Brat showcases Charli at her most confident and experimental.

name: Brat and It's the Same, But There's Three More Songs So It's Not
description: The expanded edition of Brat adds more high-energy tracks without losing the album’s fierce, glossy edge. A perfect choice for fans of hyper-pop and bold electronic pop.

name: Colour the Small One
description: An intimate, atmospheric record highlighting Sia’s early emotional songwriting. The album blends gentle electronics with deeply personal lyrics.

name: Random Access Memories
description: A lush, analog-inspired tribute to the history of dance music. Featuring live instrumentation and iconic collaborations, it's one of Daft Punk’s most ambitious works.

name: Dreamland
description: A colorful, nostalgic pop album filled with dreamy synths and vivid storytelling. Dreamland blends playful production with emotional sincerity.

name: Mirage
description: A softer, more polished follow-up to the band's late-70s classics. Mirage offers warm harmonies and shimmering production with a smooth pop-rock feel.

name: Tango in the Night
description: A glossy and richly produced album full of unforgettable hooks. Tango in the Night remains one of the band’s most vibrant and radio-friendly releases.

name: Rumours
description: A timeless masterpiece shaped by emotional turmoil and brilliant songwriting. Rumours is packed with iconic tracks and remains one of the best-selling albums ever.

name: In Waves
description: A vibrant blend of electronic textures and warm, summery rhythms. In Waves highlights Jamie xx’s unmistakable atmosphere and subtle production style.

name: Teenage Dream
description: An iconic pop record packed with hits and bright, sugary melodies. Teenage Dream defined early-2010s pop with its polished sound and unforgettable choruses.

name: Tension
description: A modern dance-pop album full of sleek production and catchy hooks. Tension showcases Kylie’s effortless ability to reinvent her sound.

name: Disco
description: A glittering tribute to classic disco with a contemporary pop twist. The album radiates joy and energy, perfect for fans of dance-floor anthems.

name: Mayhem
description: A bold and dramatic pop project with Gaga’s signature theatrical flair. Mayhem blends high-energy production with emotional storytelling.

name: Louder Please
description: A vibrant, club-inspired pop record with 90s dance influences. Louder Please showcases Rose Gray’s clear vocals and infectious energy.

name: Christmas (2011)
description: A festive modern classic featuring warm arrangements and Bublé’s smooth vocals. This album has become a holiday staple for millions of listeners.

name: First Mind
description: A gentle and introspective folk album with subtle world-music influences. First Mind showcases Mulvey’s thoughtful songwriting and soothing voice.

name: The Art of Loving
description: A soulful and warm pop album filled with tender vocals and uplifting melodies. Olivia Dean brings a fresh, heartfelt charm to every track.

name: LUX
description: A bold fusion of experimental pop and flamenco-inspired rhythms. LUX highlights Rosalía’s innovative approach and powerful artistic identity.

name: Battle Born
description: An anthemic rock album full of widescreen production and emotional storytelling. Battle Born blends classic Killers energy with heartfelt ballads.

name: Torches
description: A bright and catchy indie-pop debut filled with energetic rhythms and memorable hooks. Torches remains one of the defining alternative albums of the 2010s.
